Whenever a NEW GAME VERSION is released, various mods might stop working correctly or may even break completely!

Source String: Mods without source codes and without comment section should better not be subscribed. Without source code it is also harder to ensure a mod not include malicious code.
Translation: 沒有公開原始程式碼，且沒有標注注釋的模組，最好不要訂閱。沒有公開原始程式碼，也很難確保模組不含惡意程式碼。

Source String: Mods without source codes and with an unclear description should better not be subscribed. Without source code it is also harder to ensure a mod not include malicious code.
Translation: 沒有公開原始程式碼，且描述不明確的模組，最好不要訂閱。沒有公開原始程式碼，也很難確保模組不含惡意程式碼。

Source String: No source code published. Without source code it is harder to ensure a mod not include malicious code.
Translation: 沒有公開發佈原始程式碼，更難確保其不含惡意程式碼。

Source String: Mods without source codes, without comment section and with an unclear description should better not be subscribed. Without source code it is also harder to ensure a mod not include malicious code.
Translation: 沒有公開原始程式碼、沒有標注注釋，且描述不明確的模組，最好不要訂閱。也很難確保該模組不含惡意程式碼。

Source String: The author has deliberately hidden the mod code from other modders, which is somewhat suspicious. Without source code it is also harder to ensure a mod not include malicious code.
Translation: 作者刻意不向其他開發者展示模組的代碼，這一行為有點可疑。沒有原始程式碼，也就難以保證模組不包含惡意程式碼。

Source String: This is a test version
Translation: 這是一個測試版模組

Source String: The in-game name is
Translation: 遊戲內顯示的名字是

Source String: A black bar might appear above the bottom toolbar.
Translation: 底部工具列上可能會出現一個黑色條紋。

Source String: A red colored weight doesn't necessarily mean that the asset is bad. Just that it's very detailed and might impact performance more.
Translation: 標紅的資產不一定表示損壞。它只是非常精細，可能會造成較大的性能影響。

Source String: A version 3.0 beta has been released on GitHub but was never released on the Steam Workshop. The author wrote he’ll not update the mod any more as he blame Paradox for their DLC politics.
Translation: 一個 3.0 測試版已在 GitHub 上發佈，但從未在 Steam 創意工坊上發佈。作者寫到，他不會再更新模組，因為他指責Paradox對DLC的政治干涉。

Source String: ABLC has the functionality to prevent abandonment, and much more.
Translation: Advanced Building Level Control有防止建築物廢棄的功能，並且還有其他更豐富的功能。

Source String: Accelerated night/weekend cycles from Real Time might give issues with district services.
Translation: Real Time 的加快夜間/週末週期功能可能會給地區服務帶來問題。

Source String: Additive Shader is not compatible with the variable sunrise/sunset times from Real Time. Use the Additive Shader test version instead.
Translation: Additive Shader 與 Real Time 模組的可變日出/日落時間功能相衝突。請使用 Additive Shader test 代替。

Source String: Additive Shader props converted to PO don't show up after reloading a save.
Translation: 重新載入存檔後，轉換為 PO 的 Additive Shader 擺件不會顯示。

Source String: Adjustable Business Consumption might be incompatible with the "Farms produce crops slower and cost less" option of Rebalanced Industries.
Translation: Adjustable Business Consumption 可能與 Rebalanced Industries 的「降低農作物生產速度和降低成本」選項不相容。

Source String: Advanced Building Level Control has all functionality of Historical Districts, and more.
Translation: Advanced Building Level Control 具有 Historical Districts 的全部功能，而且還有更多其他功能。

Source String: All jobs from non-RICO buildings, including all Industries DLC buildings, are included in the service (SRV) numbers.
Translation: 非 RICO 建築的所有工作崗位，包括所有工業 DLC 建築，都列入了服務（SRV）編號中。

Source String: All kinds of issues can happen, including the disappearing of Ploppable Asphalt objects.
Translation: 各種各樣的問題都可能發生，包括 Ploppable Asphalt 物體的消失。

Source String: All players must have the exact same DLCs (none are supported) and mods. CSM is incompatible with most mods, too many to mention here. A (very short) list of supported mods: https://citiesskylinesmultiplayer.com/#/supported-mods
Translation: 所有玩家必須擁有完全相同的 DLCs 和模組。CSM 與大多數模組不相容，太多無法在這裡提及。這是相容模組的列表(非常短)：https://citiesskylinesmultiplayer.com/#/supported-mods

Source String: All recoloring will be lost when you (un)subscribe to anything while the game is running.
Translation: 當您在遊戲運行時訂閱任何內容，所訂閱的資產貼圖都將丟失。

Source String: Alternatives for this can be found here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2415082532
Translation: 此選項可以在這裡找到：https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2415082532

Source String: Always run the Steam client before you run the game. On Linux and MacOS some user action is required, see the installation guide: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2105755179/3120423877860413758/
Translation: 運行遊戲前，請先啟動Steam使用者端。在Linux或MacOS環境下，則還需使用者執行一些額外操作，請參考此安裝教程：https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2105755179/3120423877860413758/

Source String: As long as you don't use TM:PE to limit the speed for rail tracks, these mods should be compatible.
Translation: 只要您不使用 TM:PE 來限制鐵軌的速度，這些模組應該是相容的。

Source String: Autobudgetting police, healthcare and fire stations could cause land value to drop, because lower budget means lower cover area.
Translation: 使用警察、醫療和消防站的自動預算可能導致土地價值下降，因為預算較低意味著覆蓋面積較低。

Source String: Backup your save before using this tool!
Translation: 在使用此工具之前備份您的存檔！

Source String: Better Highway Icons triggers an error popup from Building Themes ('System.Reflection.MonoMethod.Invoke'). Both mods still appear to work after.
Translation: Better Highway Icons 導致了 Building Themes 彈出錯誤（'System.Reflection.MonoMethod.Invoke')。這兩個模組似乎都能正常工作。

Source String: BOB has the functionality of Prop it Up, and more.
Translation: BOB 具有 Prop it Up 的功能，並且還有其他更豐富的功能。

Source String: Both mods have options to hide panels on main menu screen. Only use one mod to hide them, or you might run into issues.
Translation: 兩個模組都有在主選單上隱藏面板的選項。但只能使用一個模組來隱藏它們，如果同時使用，您可能會遇到問題。

Source String: Both mods replace the 'vanilla matchmaker', making them incompatible.
Translation: 兩個模組都替換了「原版匹配器」，因此它們不相容。

Source String: Both mods touch the same game functionality and probably conflict.
Translation: 兩個模組都有相同的遊戲功能，因此可能發生衝突。

Source String: Both mods use the Tab key. Use another first person mod, or change the key for First-person Auto-walking.
Translation: 這兩個模組都使用 Tab 鍵。請使用另一個第一人稱的模組，或者更改 First-person Auto-walking 的按鍵。

Source String: Causes trees to float. You could switch to Tree Anarchy, which has the functionality of both these mods.
Translation: 會引起樹木晃動。你可以替換為 Tree Anarchy ，其具有這兩個模組的功能。

Source String: CAUTION: DO NOT SUPPRESS ERRORS in the mod options or in the popups from this mod, as it makes troubleshooting mod/asset issues near impossible. Hiding errors does not make them go away, and will make your game less reliable!
Translation: 注意：不要在模組選項或此模組的快顯視窗中發送資訊，因為它幾乎不可能排除模組和資產問題。隱藏錯誤不會讓它們消失，反而會使您的遊戲不太可靠！

Source String: CAUTION: If you use this and save, the game save is broken.
Translation: 注意：如果您使用這個並保存，存檔就會被損壞。

Source String: CAUTION: This only hides the problem icons. The problems still exist! This can quickly lead to mass abandonment if you forget to check for problems.
Translation: 注意：這只能隱藏問題圖示。問題仍然存在！如果你忘記解決問題，這可能會導致大規模廢棄。

Source String: Change the construction speed to 100% in Real Time's settings to avoid buildings disappearing.
Translation: 在 Real Time 的設置中將施工速度更改為100%，以避免建築物消失。

Source String: Changing the date may cause a gap in the graph or cause part of the graph to be overwritten.
Translation: 更改日期可能會導致圖形中出現間隙或部分圖形被覆蓋。

Source String: Clicking in the bottom bar for UEC functionality does not work.
Translation: 點擊底部欄以獲取UEC功能是無效的。

Source String: Clouds & Fog Toggler overrules the fog options of Hide it, Bobby.
Translation: Clouds & Fog Toggler 與 Hide it, Bobby 的隱藏雲霧選項衝突。

Source String: Clouds & Fog Toggler overrules the fog options of Hide It.
Translation: Clouds & Fog Toggler 與 Hide it 的隱藏雲霧選項衝突。

Source String: If you change the time of day in Play It!, this will be reset to Real Time values if you unpause. This is intended behavior. Also speeding up the game works fine, but if you change the day/night cycle speed, the time of the day on the clock stays the same and so do the citizens (visually days fly by but the time that the real time mod sets actually affects the citizens' behavior).
Translation: 如果您使用 Play It! 改變了一天中的時間，在取消暫停狀態後，時間會被重置到 Real Time 的值。這是預期的行為。加速遊戲仍然有效，但如果您更改了晝夜迴圈的速度，時鐘上顯示的時間仍會保持為 Real Time 的時間，市民也是如此（視覺上時間流逝得很快，但實際上是 Real Time 模組內的時間影響市民的行為）

Source String: Compatibility is uncertain, but the increased limit from More Vehicles is probably not used by PXPVehicleInfo, leading to incorrect numbers when going beyond the original vehicle limit.
Translation: 相容性尚不確定，但PXPVehicleInfo可能未使用 More Vehicles 增加的限制，從而導致超出原始車輛限制時顯示的數位不正確。

Source String: Consider replacing the old asset(s) that need this by newer ones and then unsubscribe this mod.
Translation: 考慮用較新的資產替換需要的舊資產，然後取消訂閱此模組。

Source String: Copyright by OpenMSX Authors, licensed under GPL v2.
Translation: 由 OpenMSX 作者授予的版權，並在 GPL v2 下授權。

Source String: Creative Commons license.
Translation: 知識共用授權合約。

Source String: CSM can break Find It. Running the game as administrator may temporarily solve the incompatibility issue.
Translation: CSM 會與 Find It 衝突。請使用管理員許可權運行遊戲，可以暫時解決不相容問題。

Source String: CSUR is incompatible with the advanced zoning options in Network Extensions.
Translation: CSUR 與 Network Extensions 中的高級分區選項不相容。

Source String: Curb Height Adjuster will not affect CSUR roads, because they don't use standard road depths.
Translation: Curb Height Adjter不會影響 CSUR 道路，因為它們不使用標準的道路深度。

Source String: Daylight Classic overrules the fog options of Hide It, Bobby.
Translation: Daylight Classic 與 Hide it, Bobby 的隱藏雲霧選項衝突。

Source String: Daylight Classic overrules the fog options of Hide It.
Translation: Daylight Classic 與 Hide It 的隱藏雲霧選項衝突。

Source String: Deactivate the build in mod of Colossal Order, as its function is included in Extra Landscaping Tools.
Translation: 請停用 Colossal Order 的內置模組，因為它的功能包含在 Extra Landscaping Tools 中。

Source String: Deactivate the build in mods of Colossal Order, as the functions are included in Game Anarchy: Unlimited Money, Unlimited Oil And Ore, Unlock All. Take care to activate the functions before loading into a save.
Translation: 請停用 Colossal Order 的內置模組：無限金錢、無限石油和礦石、全部解鎖，因為這些功能已經包含在了 Game Anarchy 裡。在載入存檔之前，請注意啟用 Game Anarchy 的這些功能。

Source String: Disable the Classic sunlight color, Classic sunlight intensity and Classic for color settings in Daylight Classic.
Translation: 禁用 Daylight Classic 中的「經典日光色彩」、「經典日光強度」、「經典濾鏡色調」設置。

Source String: Disabling water pollution is not immediate, it takes some time for the water to clear up. Re-enabling ground or water pollution is also not immediate, it takes some time to build up again.
Translation: 消除水污染不是立即的，需要一些時間才能使水得到淨化。恢復地面污染或水污染也不是立即的，需要一段時間才能恢復。

Source String: Due to the significant changes to the base game, this mod is best used for new games only.
Translation: 由於遊戲的重大更新，這個模組最好僅用於新建遊戲。

Source String: EDS doesn't detect the extra CitizenUnits.
Translation: EDS 沒有檢測到額外的公民單位。

Source String: Either toggle anarchy off or bulldoze trees/rocks before placing anything, to prevent trees/rocks in buildings or roads.
Translation: 在放置任何東西之前切換無碰撞或用推土機推倒樹木/岩石，以防止建築物或道路上出現樹木/岩石。

Source String: Elevated road, bridges and tunnels are separate network types and will need to be replaced separately. Read workshop page for links to replacement collections.
Translation: 高架、橋樑和隧道是分開的網路類型，需要單獨替換。閱讀創意工坊頁面以獲取替換資產的連結。

Source String: EML already has a better limit showing functionality.
Translation: Extended Managers Library 已經有了更好的物品上限顯示功能。

Source String: EML already has the functionality of Unlimited Outside Connections.
Translation: Extended Managers Library Beta 已經具有了 Unlimited Outside Connections 的功能。

Source String: EML has electrified roads functionality built-in.
Translation: Extended Managers Library Beta 已經內置了道路通電的功能。

Source String: Existing IMT 'raised meshes' (traffic islands) will not automatically have their heights adjusted. Other markings will adjust automatically.
Translation: 目前 Intersection Marking Tool 不會自動調整「突起的填充圖案」（路肩等）的高度來匹配。其他的 IMT 標線會自動調整高度。

Source String: Extended InfoPanel 2 has all functionality from HideUI.
Translation: Extended InfoPanel 2 已經具有 HideUI 的所有功能。

Source String: Extended InfoPanel 2 has all functionality from More Simulation Speed Options.
Translation: Extended InfoPanel 2 已經具有 More Simulation Speed Options 的所有功能。

Source String: Extended InfoPanel already has Chirper move functionality.
Translation: Extended InfoPanel 已經具有 Chirper 的移動功能。

Source String: Find It filters don't work correctly with the Tree & Vehicle Prop mod.
Translation: Find It 的搜索功能與 Tree & Vehicle Prop 不能很好的相容。

Source String: Find It has the ability to 'unlock all'. You can unsubscribe the 'Unlock All + Wonders' mod.
Translation: Find It 已經有了「全部解鎖」的功能，請取消'Unlock All + Wonders'模組。

Source String: Will not bulldoze if you own Natural Disasters. You need to use Disaster Response Unit in this case. Newer building categories are not bulldozed.
Translation: 如果你擁有 Natural Disasters DLC ，就不會剷除廢棄建築。這種情況下，需要使用災難回應單位。較新類別的建築不會被自動剷除。

Source String: Firefighters might walk instead of run back to their firetruck.
Translation: 消防員可能走路，而不是跑到他們的消防車上。

Source String: For public transport vehicles that spawn at a depot, the vehicles are listed at the depot instead of the station.
Translation: 在車庫生成的公共運輸車輛停放在車庫，而不是在車站。

Source String: For transit hubs, this only works if the bus part is a sub-building.
Translation: 對於轉運樞紐，只有在公共汽車部分是子模型的情況下才能發揮作用。

Source String: FPS Booster has all functionality of Mini FPS Booster, and more.
Translation: FPS Booster 已經具有 Mini FPS Booster 的所有功能，而且還有更多其他功能。

Source String: From the main menu, the delay time in the mod options will be incorrect. While in game, the mod options do show the correct delay time, corresponding to the Real Time slowed time.
Translation: 在主功能表中，模組選項中的延遲時間不能正確顯示。在遊戲中，模組選項顯示了正確的延遲時間，與 Real Time 減緩的時間相對應。

Source String: Game pauses automatially when you change time, and time resets back when you unpause. Time speed options in TimeWarp will not work.
Translation: 當您更改時間時，遊戲會自動暫停，當你解除暫停時，時間會重置回來。TimeWarp 中的時間速度選項將無法工作。

Source String: Game pauses automatially when you change time, and time resets back when you unpause. Time speed options in Ultimate Eyecandy will not work.
Translation: 當您更改時間時，遊戲會自動暫停，當你解除暫停時，時間會重置回來。Ultimate Eyecandy 中的時間速度選項將無法工作。

Source String: Garbage Bin Controller breaks Harmony and any mod depending on Harmony. Switch to Garbage Bin Manager.
Translation: Garbage Bin Controller 會損壞 Harmony 以及任何依賴於 Harmony 的模組。請使用 Garbage Bin Manager 代替。

Source String: Harmony Redesigned might disable UI Resolution. Use the regular version of Harmony instead.
Translation: Harmony Redesigned 可能會導致 UI Resolution 被禁用。請使用正常版本的 Harmony 代替。

Source String: If contour lines doesn't work, turn off "Overwrite Terrain" and set the value to around 100 in ROTTERdams options.
Translation: 如果等高線無法正常顯示，請在 ROTTERdams 的模組設置中關閉「Overwrite Terrain」選項並將 strength 值設置為100。

Source String: If the default looks too dark, turn up the global and/or ambient light intensity settings in Ultimate Eyecandy. Shadows must be set to max using Shadow Strength Adjuster to prevent the sun from leaking through objects. To make shadows less visible, reduce global light intensity and increase ambient light intensity in Ultimate Eyecandy.
Translation: 如果預設設置看起來太暗，請在 Ultimate Eyecandy 中打開全域/環境光強度設置。必須使用 Shadow Strength Adjuster 將陰影設置為最大，以防止陽光穿過物品對象。要使陰影更不可見，請在 Ultimate Eyecandy 中降低全域光強度並增加環境光強度。

Source String: If you change graphics settings or prop visibility distance, you will have to restart the game for the decals to update.
Translation: 如果更改圖形設置或擺件可見性距離，則必須重新啟動遊戲才能更新貼花。

Source String: If you change the Move It "enhanced Pillar Control" option your existing surface paints might disappear.
Translation: 如果您更改了 Move It 的「高級橋墩控制」選項，您現有的地面塗抹可能會消失。

Source String: If you create a U-turn with TM:PE lane connections, the U-turn rule will remain after you remove that lane connection. So remove it manually.
Translation: 如果您使用 TM:PE 車道連接創建了一個掉頭轉向，那麼當您移除該車道連接後，掉頭轉向規則將保持。所以請手動移除。

Source String: If you don't want fire to spread at all from tree to tree, you don't need this mod but can instead enable the game option "No fire spread function".
Translation: 如果你不想讓火災到處蔓延， 你不需要這個模組，而是打開遊戲選項「火災不會蔓延」。

Source String: If you enable this mod for a resource that you have industry buildings producing, the buildings will try to export all of its products. This will most likely cause the industry to be abandoned because there aren't enough buyers.
Translation: 如果你為了工業資源而啟用這個模組，但是有工業建築正在生產，那麼這些建築物將試圖出口其所有產品。這很可能導致該工廠被放棄，因為買方不足。

Source String: If you have issues with nature reserve paths or the topographic lines overlay, read the mod description on the Steam Workshop for fixes.
Translation: 如果您發現自然保護區路徑有問題或者等高線重疊，請閱讀Steam創意工坊裡的模組描述進行修復。

Source String: If you use more than one of the OxylonEuroSoundpack's, you might get one or more "already exists" warnings. These are harmless.
Translation: 如果您使用多個OxylonEuroSoundpack，您可能會得到一個或多個「已經存在的警告」。這些警告是無害的。

Source String: If you use this only for high resolution screenshots, you don't need this mod and can use the default Shift-F12 instead.
Translation: 如果您只用於高解析度螢幕截圖，您不需要這個模組，可以使用預設的 Shift+F12 高清截圖鍵代替。

Source String: If you want the new cubemap only by day, with the default night sky, enable the following settings for Fog Controller: "Daynight Fog" and "Classic Fog", and enable the following settings for Daylight Classic: "Classic sunlight color", "Classic sunlight intensity", "Classic fog Effect" and "Allow Classic fog effect if day/night cycle is on".
Translation:
如果你只想在白天使用新的 Cubemap，但在夜晚使用預設的天空，在 Fog Controller 中啟用如下選項：
- "Daynight Fog"和"Classic Fog"，
並在 Daylight Classic 中啟用以下選項：
- 「經典日光色彩」、「經典日光強度」、「經典霧效果」 和 「Allow Classic fog effect if day/night cycle is on」。

Source String: If you want to use the old props that are included in the original mod, you need to keep the original mod subscribed, but disabled. Alternatively you could move the original .crp files to your local asset folder and unsub the original mod. If you start a new city it's the best to unsubscribe the original mod and use the Ploppable Surfaces from this collection: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2872742333
Translation: 如果你想使用原模組中包含的舊擺件，你需要保留原模組訂閱，但要禁用。或者，您可以將原始的.crp檔移動到本地資產資料夾，然後取消原模組。如果你開始一個新存檔，最好取消訂閱原來的模組並使用這個合集中的 Ploppable Surfaces：https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2872742333

Source String: If you're unable to move props vertically with Move It, try turning prop snapping off and on again in the mod options of Prop Anarchy.
Translation: 如果您無法使用 Move It 上下移動擺件，請嘗試關閉 prop snapping 並再次在 Prop Anarchy 中打開prop snapping。

Source String: IMT markings will be lost on replaced network segments and connected intersections.
Translation: 替換後的路段與路口會丟失 Intersection Marking Tool 的標線。

Source String: In order to build outside connections with zonable roads outside of unlocked tiles you need to temporarily disable zoning with another mod. In the map editor the connections have to use vanilla roads, not custom roads. Intercity buses only enter the city via 1-way highway outside connections, not via any 2-way road.
Translation: 為了在已解鎖的地塊之外建設可分區的對外連接道路，您需要使用另一個模組臨時禁用分區。在地圖編輯器中，連接必須使用普通道路，而不是自訂道路。城際公車只能通過單向的外部連接道路進入城市，而不是通過雙向道路。

Source String: In Settings of "Express Bus Services (TLM Plugin)" the options "Experimental" and "Agressive" may cause buses to despawn if Transport Line Manager is also used. The option "Prudential" works as expected.
Translation: 如果您使用了 Transport Line Manager ，那麼在「 Express Bus Services（TLM的外掛程式）」的設置中，「Experimental」和「Agressive」選項可能會導致公車停運。選項「Prudential」可以按預期工作。

Source String: The functionality of this mod is included in the game itself.
Translation: 此模組的功能已被遊戲本身包含。

Source String: Incorrectly shows as Cinematic Camera.
Translation: 錯誤的顯示為 Cinematic Camera。

Source String: Instead of (or combined with) this mod you can download custom citizens from the Workshop for a more diverse crowd.
Translation: 您可以從創意工坊下載自訂公民資產，以適應多樣化的人群，用以代替（或搭配使用）此模組。

Source String: Intended only for flat ground.
Translation: 僅用於平坦地面。

Source String: Intercity buses only enter the city via 1-way highway outside connections, not via any 2-way road.
Translation: 城際公車只能從對外連接的單向高速公路進出城市，不能通過任何雙向的道路進入城市。

Source String: IPT2 already has a (different) 'spawning delay' functionality. This works in real-time instead of game-time, and for individual depots.
Translation: Improved Public Transport 2 已經有了一個(不同）的「延遲生成」功能。它可以即時調整，並且適用於各個車站。

Source String: It is STRONGLY recommended not to use this mod!
Translation: 建議不要使用這個模組！

Source String: It is strongly recommended to make a backup of an existing save before using this mod on it.
Translation: 強烈建議在使用此模組之前備份現有的存檔。

Source String: It takes some time before the traffic starts obeying new rules. The author classifies this mod as advanced/experimental.
Translation: 這需要一段時間才能開始遵守新的規則。作者將這模組歸類為高級/實驗型。

Source String: It's best to disable the dynamic day length option in Real Time, because Cubemap Replacer uses hard-coded times for sunset/sunrise.
Translation: 最好在 Real Time 中禁用動態日長度選項，因為 Cubemap Replacer 使用固定編碼的日落/日出時間。

Source String: It's best to disable the dynamic day length option in Real Time, because Relight uses hard-coded times for sunset/sunrise.
Translation: 最好在 Real Time 中禁用動態日長度選項，因為 Relight 使用固定編碼的日落/日出時間。

Source String: It's not recommended to use this in the map editor, because created maps will require Prop Anarchy.
Translation: 不建議在地圖編輯器中使用此選項，因為創建的地圖需要 Prop Anarchy 。

Source String: It's unclear if this actually needs the Extra Vehicle Effects mod.
Translation: 不清楚這是否實際需要 Extra Vehicle Effects mod。

Source String: Lifecycle Rebalance already includes 'no deathcare' functionality.
Translation: Lifecycle Rebalance 已經包含了「No Deathcare」功能。

Source String: Loading Screen Mod includes all functionality from Safenets, and much more.
Translation: Loading Screen Mod 包含了 Safenets 的所有功能，還提供了更多其他功能。

Source String: Make historical' is part of the game itself now, but with this mod a historical building can't get abandoned.
Translation: 設置歷史建築是遊戲本身的一部分，但在這個模組中，歷史建築不會被廢棄。

Source String: Make sure the image you use is a square, not a rectangle.
Translation: 請確保您使用的圖像是正方形，而不是長方形。

Source String: Make sure to have the mod always on, directly from the start of a new game. Also, either fix the values from the start and leave them fixed forever, or never fix them at all. Switching between fixed and unfixed values can really throw the demand out of balance, and it might take ages for the demand to catch up. Can cause issues in late game in the way that suddenly all demands stops. Loading the city w/o this mod installed and save it again, fixes this issue. Turn off "Show RCI demand value on status bar", as it will spam your log and causes issues.
Translation:
從新存檔開始時，請一直保持此模組啟用。此外，要麼在在開始時就修改設定值，並在以後保持不變；要麼不修改模組的設定值。
在已修改/未修改的值之間切換，將會使城市需求失去平衡。可能需要很長時間來恢復到正常的需求。
在後期的遊戲中，模組可能導致全部需求突然消失。取消訂閱此模組，再次載入存檔並保存，即可解決需求消失的問題。
請在模組選項中關閉「在需求小圖表中顯示需求量」，因為這個選項會在日誌檔中輸出大量垃圾資訊，並導致其他問題。

Source String: Mod settings for Shadow Distance Fix reset on game load.
Translation: Shadow Distance Fix 的模組設置會在重進遊戲時被重置。

Source String: Mods without source codes and with an unclear description should better not be subscribed.
Translation: 沒有原始程式碼和描述不明確的模組最好不要訂閱。

Source String: MOM already allows you to convert train stations to metro stations.
Translation: MOM 已允許您將火車站轉換為地鐵站。

Source String: MOM handles spawn points for metro, so if you have issues with metro spawns, check MOM.
Translation: MOM 會處理地鐵的生成點，因此如果您遇到地鐵生成問題，請檢查MOM。

Source String: More Advanced OptionsPanel has the functionality of Sort Mod Settings, and more.
Translation: More Advanced OptionsPanel 具有 Sort Mod Settings 的功能，還有更多其他功能。

Source String: More Advanced OptionsPanel has the functionality of Wider OptionsPanel, and more.
Translation: More Advanced OptionsPanel 具有 Wider OptionsPanel 的功能，還有更多其他功能。

Source String: Movement speed has a significant impact on the boarding times at train and metro stations, especially for longer trains. Citizens crossing the streets slowly can lead to more stuttering of traffic, because they block the cars.
Translation: 移動速度對火車站和地鐵站的上車時間有重大影響，特別是對於較長的列車。市民緩慢過馬路會導致交通堵塞，因為他們會阻塞汽車。

Source String: Music used with permission from the game developer, ConcernedApe, but unknown if streaming is allowed.
Translation: 音樂是在遊戲開發商 ConcernedApe 的許可下使用的，但不清楚是否允許在直播時使用。

Source String: Natural Disasters Overhaul gets confused by the slower flow of time. Most notably forest fires will be much more common. Set the fire probability low as a workaround.
Translation: Natural Disasters Overhaul 會因為時間流逝較慢而變得混亂。更重要的是，森林火災會變得更加常見。將火災概率設置為較低值是一個解決方法。

Source String: Needs a specific process to change sounds. Read workshop page carefully
Translation: 需要一個特定的過程來改變聲音。請仔細閱讀創意工坊頁面的說明。

Source String: Network Skins causes zoning glitches on CSUR roads.
Translation: Network Skins 會造成 CSUR 道路兩旁分區的破碎。

Source String: Network Skins has all functionality of NoPillars.
Translation: Network Skins 具有 NoPillars 的所有功能。

Source String: Network Skins modifications will be lost on replaced network segments.
Translation: Network Skins 做出的修改會在被替換的路段中丟失。

Source String: New skins added with Network Skins in a session do not always reflect Traffic Light Replacer changes until a game reload.
Translation: 在遊戲重新載入之前，Network Skins 修改過的道路外觀不會顯示 Traffic Light Replacer 做出的更改。

Source String: No need to subscribe More Network Stuff, if you are not creating Maps or assets.
Translation: 如果您不是在創建新資產或者新地圖，那麼無需訂閱 More Network Stuff 。

Source String: Node Controller already has the ability to add a crosswalk anywhere on a road.
Translation: Node Controller 已經可以在道路的任何地方添加斑馬線。

Source String: Node Controller Renewal has less features, but a better UI. If you don't use the extra features, you might want to switch to Node Controller Renewal.
Translation: Node Controller Renewal 的功能較少，但使用者介面較好。如果您不使用額外的功能，可以替換為 Node Controller Renewal 。

Source String: NOTE: Don't use the workaround described on the Workshop page (reloading the city), as this might cause issues with other mods.
Translation: 注意：不要使用創意工坊頁面上描述的解決方法（重新載入存檔），因為這可能會與其他模組衝突。

Source String: Note: The locale file will not be removed when unsubscribing. It has to be removed manually, see Workshop page.
Translation: 注意：取消訂閱時並不會刪除本地檔。它必須手動刪除，詳情請閱讀創意工坊頁面的描述。

Source String: Nursing Homes will have an unneeded, blank vehicle selection window.
Translation: 療養院將有一個不需要的空白車輛選擇視窗。

Source String: Only centered CSUR modules can create intersections with non-CSUR roads.
Translation: 只有居中的 CSUR 模組才能創建與非 CSUR 道路的交叉路口。

Source String: Painted surfaces might reset when subscribing to anything while the game is running.
Translation: 當遊戲運行時訂閱任何東西，已塗抹的地面可能會被重置。

Source String: Painter breaks Harmony and any mod depending on Harmony. Switch to Repaint.
Translation: Painter 會導致 Harmony 以及任何依賴於 Harmony 的模組損壞。請替換為 Repaint。

Source String: Picker picking a different object when Dynamic Asset sorter changes the order of items.
Translation: 當 Dynamic Asset Sorter 改變專案順序時，會導致 Picker 選擇到不一致的物品。

Source String: Placed 'NTCP' props show as missing props in Loading Screen Mod. This is a false alert and can be ignored.
Translation: 可放置的「NTCP」屬性的擺件在 Loading Screen Mod 中顯示為缺失。這是一個錯誤的警告，可以忽略。

Source String: Play It already has game speed functionality.
Translation: Play It 已經具有調整遊戲速度的功能。

Source String: Play It has more extensive weather options.
Translation: Play It 有更多的天氣選項。

Source String: Play It has most functionality of Ultimate Eyecandy. Combine Play It with Render It and Theme Mixer 2 for full replacement functionality.
Translation: Play It 已經有了 Ultimate Eyecandy 的大部分功能。同時使用 Play It 、 Render It 、 Theme Mixer 2 可以完全代替 Ultimate Eyecandy 。

Source String: Please note that RT mod compatibility is in beta and there may be bugs present.
Translation: 請注意 RT 模組的相容性正在測試中，其可能存在bug。

Source String: Ploppable RICO now has the functionality of Grow the Ploppables. Using both mods together is possible, but may give inconsistent results unless your settings are aligned. Removing Grow the Ploppables is recommended, but if done on an existing game you have to make sure that the settings of both mods are the same.
Translation: Ploppable RICO 現在具有 Grow the Ploppables 的功能。同時使用這兩個模組是可以的，但您的設置必須相同，否則可能會給出不一致的結果。建議刪除 Grow the Ploppables 。但如果在現有遊戲上完成了，您必須確保兩個模組的設置相同。

Source String: Prop Anarchy already has a better prop painting functionality.
Translation: Prop Anarchy 已經具有了更好的擺件調色功能。

Source String: Prop Anarchy already has prop scaling functionality.
Translation: Prop Anarchy 已經具有了縮放擺件的功能。

Source String: Prop Anarchy already has the transparency LOD fix.
Translation: Prop Anarchy 已經具有了修復透明度 LOD 的功能。

Source String: Prop hiding has been removed from this mod, but is available in the BOB mod.
Translation: 擺件隱藏功能已從此模組中移除，該功能已被 BOB 模組整合。

Source String: Prop Painter was not updated to recent Move It updates, creating issues for any mod that try to integrate with Move It.
Translation: Prop Painter 沒有更新到最近的 Move It 版本，它會給與 Move It 搭配使用的任何模組造成問題。

Source String: Real City doesn't detect the extra CitizenUnits.
Translation: Real City 沒有檢測到額外的公民單位。

Source String: Real Time is meant for cities with a population of up to 65.000 (it can be used on larger cities but there might be issues). Real Time completely changes the simulation, which makes it incompatible with a lot of other mods, especially those that alter or depend on time progression.
Translation: Real Time 適用于人口不高於65 000人的城市（可用於較大的城市，但可能存在有問題）。Real Time 完全改變了類比規則，這使它與許多模組不相容，特別是那些改變或依賴時間進程的模組。

Source String: Real Time might delay the arrival of extra Starting Money.
Translation: Real Time 可能會延遲額外啟動資金的到賬。

Source String: Price changes have no effect on the bank balance.
Translation: 價格變動對銀行餘額沒有影響。

Source String: Render It already has shadow strength functionality.
Translation: Render It 已經具有了調整陰影強度的功能。

Source String: Replacing road arrows with Prop Switcher is not recommended and might give an 'array out of bounds' error.
Translation: 不推薦使用 Prop Switcher 替換道路箭頭，這可能會造成一個「陣列超限」錯誤。

Source String: Require removing all dependent assets before removing the mod. Button for that is in options of the mod.
Translation: 需要移除所有的相關資產後才能取消訂閱模組。該功能的按鈕在模組設置的選項中（Delete Parking Lot Snapping Assets）。

Source String: Roads outside of the central 25 tiles area must have zoning disabled. Buildings that consume water cannot be constructed outside the central 25 tiles area.
Translation: 在中部25格地塊區之外的道路必須有禁用區域。消耗水的建築物不能在中部25格地塊區之外建造。

Source String: Service Vehicle Selector 2 blocks Theme Mixer 2 for some players to be able to change the Theme textures.
Translation: Service Vehicle Selector 2 會限制 Theme Mixer 2 ，以便某些玩家能夠更改主題紋理。

Source String: Service Vehicle Selector has all functionality of RiverCargoHarborMod. Unsubscribe the latter.
Translation: Service Vehicle Selector 具有 RiverCargoHarborMod 的所有功能。請取消訂閱後者。

Source String: Setting traffic lights or priority signs with TM:PE on train tracks will not work. Other settings do work.
Translation: 在列車軌道上使用 TM:PE 設置交通燈或優先標誌將無法正常工作。其他設置能正常工作。

Source String: Several users report that Parallel Road Tool won't work with Network Skins subscribed.
Translation: 幾個使用者報告說， Parallel Road Tool 與 Network Skins 不相容。

Source String: Several users report using these together without issues.
Translation: 幾個使用者報告說，他們使用這些模組沒有問題。

Source String: Shared Stops can't be created on CSUR express roads (it does work on regular and compact roads).
Translation: 無法在 CSUR 高架路上使用 Shared Stops（它只適用於規則且緊湊的道路上)。

Source String: SharedStopEnabler has the functionality to create elevated stops.
Translation: SharedStopEnagler 已經具有在高架上創建車站的功能。

Source String: Some assets are not compatible with PO, including most vanilla props and all terrain-conforming props and buildings. These will disappear after conversion.
Translation: 有些資產與 PO 不相容，包括大多數原版擺件和所有能跟隨地形的擺件和建築物。這些資產將在轉換後消失。

Source String: Some features of Camera Positions Utility won't work when in first person mode. Furthermore, the FOV features of Camera Positions Utility will be disabled.
Translation: Camera Positions Utility 的部分功能與第一人稱模組不相容。此外，Camera Positions Utility 的 視界調整功能將被禁用。

Source String: Some features of TM:PE work on reversible tram tracks, but not all.
Translation: TM:PE 的一些功能能用於雙向電車軌道，但不是全部功能。

Source String: Some functions will not work for locally installed assets: sort by recent download, search by author name, open Workshop page.
Translation: 有些功能將無法用於本地安裝的資產：按最近下載排序，按作者姓名搜索，打開創意工坊頁面。

Source String: Some roads from Network Extensions spawn the wrong or an extra traffic light.
Translation: 某些 Network Extensions 的道路會造成交通信號燈錯誤或多餘。

Source String: Some roads from Network Extensions spawn the wrong or no traffic light.
Translation: 某些 Network Extensions 的道路會造成交通信號燈錯誤或消失。

Source String: Some roads from Network Extensions spawn the wrong traffic light.
Translation: 某些 Network Extensions 的道路會造成交通信號燈錯誤。

Source String: Some textures on Network Extensions roads might not load.
Translation: Network Extensions 道路上的一些紋理可能無法載入。

Source String: Some user get these to work together.
Translation: 有些使用者會讓它們一起工作。

Source String: Some Workshop roads with non-standard curb heights will not have their curb height adjusted by this mod. Decals and terrain-conforming props placed on the road surface, will automatically adjust to the new height. Ploppable surfaces and other non-terrain-conforming props will need to be manually moved up/down.
Translation: 此模組不能調整非標準路緣高度的創意工坊道路。貼在路面上的貼花和能跟隨地形的擺件將自動調整到新高度。需要手動向上/向下移動調整擺放的地皮和其他不會跟隨地形的擺件。

Source String: Spawn points for cargo trucks are not supported on cargo train stations, cargo airports or cargo harbors.
Translation: 貨車站、貨運機場或貨運碼頭不支持修改貨運卡車的生成點。

Source String: TAA can cause some flickering, ghosting and jitter. This is not a bug from this mod, but inherent to TAA. Read the Workshop page for details.
Translation: TAA（時間抗鋸齒） 可能會引起一些閃爍、重影和抖動。這不是這個mod的錯誤，但是是TAA固有的錯誤。請閱讀創意工坊頁面瞭解詳情。

Source String: Terrain conforming props cannot be moved up/down.
Translation: 跟隨地形的擺件不能上下移動。

Source String: The 'No Problem' mod makes the game think the problem doesn't exist, while the 'Hide Problems' mod only hides the icon. Each mod can (ironically) already lead to serious problems. Combining them is really asking for it...
Translation: 'No Problem' mod 使遊戲認為問題不存在，而'Hide Problems' mod 只隱藏圖示。每個模組（具有諷刺意義）可能已經導致了嚴重的問題。把它們結合起來一起用真是自討苦吃。。。

Source String: The 'Remove Unwanted' button may not work properly.
Translation: 「移除不想要的」按鈕可能無法正常工作。

Source String: Can't show data from newer extension mods like Extended Managers Library.
Translation: 無法顯示 Extended Managers Library 等較新擴展模組的資料。

Source String: The AdjacentToPurchased option of Common Ground is incompatible with 81 Tiles. Common Ground is not needed for gameplay when you unlock all 81 tiles, but is still great for use in the map editor.
Translation:
Common Ground 的鄰近已購買選項與 81 Tiles不相容。
當你解鎖所有81個地塊時，遊戲不再需要 Common Ground ，但在地圖編輯器中仍然很有用。

Source String: The author classifies this mod as experimental. It's probably wise to avoid going too crazy with the numbers.
Translation: 作者將此模組歸類為實驗性模組。也許明智的做法是避免對數字過於瘋狂。

Source String: The author of Camera Positions Utility says these are incompatible, but some users report them working fine together.
Translation: Camera Positions Utility 的作者說，這些是不相容的，但一些使用者報告說它們可以一起使用。

Source String: The author recommends to set accelaration and braking for train engines in AVO to 0.2 for correct sound timing.
Translation: 作者建議將 Advanced Vehicle Options 中列車發動機的加速和制動設置為0.2，以獲得正確的音效

Source String: The behavior of Game Day Timer will change slightly when combined with Real Time. See the Workshop page.
Translation: 當啟用 Real Time 後， Game Day Timer 的部分行為會發生改變。具體請閱讀創意工坊頁面。

Source String: The copy feature from the Move It mod can also duplicate unique buildings.
Translation: Move It mod 的複製功能也可以複製獨特建築。

Source String: The data converter can only do its work when Plop the Growables is not subscribed.
Translation: 資料轉換器只能在 Plop The Growables 未訂閱時工作。

Source String: The destination to which the warehouse sends goods needs to be reachable by another transport mode next to barges. When a different transport mode provides a shorter route, no further barges are spawned. When the other barge harbour becomes unreachable, no further barges are spawned.
Translation: 倉庫發送貨物的目的地需要通過另一種運輸模式在下一次駁船上到達。當另一種運輸方式提供較短的路線時，便不會有更多的駁船出現，當另一艘駁船無法到達時，便不會產生更多的駁船。

Source String: Road Builder should not be used together with FPS Booster, as in this case some patches will not be applied correctly. As Road Builder is only working in Editor, and not do anything in normal game, it should be at least deactivated if you want to play the game. It's even better to exclude Road Builder with Loading Order Tool or to unsubscribe Road Builder if you not want to create roads. FPS Booster therefore should be at least deactivated if you want to enter the Editor and use Road Builder. It's even better to exclude FPS Booster with Loading Order Tool or to unsubscribe FPS Booster if you want to create roads.
Translation:
請勿同時使用 Road Builder 與 FPS Booster 模組，因為同時使用它們會導致部分修補程式無法運行。由於 Road Builder 只在編輯器裡有作用，不在遊戲存檔內運行，因此您至少需要禁用它才能玩遊戲。
如果您不想使用 Road Builder 來創建道路資產，那麼應該使用 Loading Order Tool 禁用它或者取消訂閱 Road Builder 。
如果您想要在編輯器內使用 Road Builder，那麼應該禁用 FPS Booster ，當然，最好是使用 Loading Order Tool 禁用它或者取消訂閱 FPS Booster 。

Source String: Not showing information for newer DLC assets.
Translation: 不顯示較新DLC資產的資訊。

Source String: The game already has this functionality, so this mod is not really needed. This mod uses slightly different values than the base game, so the benefit - if any - is minimal.
Translation: 遊戲已經內置了該功能，因此實際上並不需要該模組。該模組使用的數值與遊戲本體的差異很小，因此，如果該模組有效果，那也只是極其微小的效果。

Source String: The game already solves the issue of not having enough low educated workers by employing highly educated people in lower-education jobs.
Translation: 遊戲通過雇傭高學歷的人從事低學歷的工作，已經解決了沒有足夠的低學歷工人的問題。

Source String: The game has one-way train tracks as well, but this also has a single two-way track and is still needed for custom stations with a one-way station track.
Translation: 遊戲也有單向火車軌道，但它也有單條雙向軌道，對於有單向軌道的自訂車站來說仍然需要。

Source String: The game sometimes forgets the real start of a route and might show it as 'No District'.
Translation: 遊戲有時會丟失路線的真正起點，並可能顯示為「無區域」。

Source String: The graphs from Enhanced Outside Connections View are far less useful because time flows much more slowly.
Translation: Enhanced Outside Connections View 的圖表遠遠沒有那麼有用，因為時間流逝得慢得很多。

Source String: The mod uses an executable to actually draw the map. That executable works on Windows only and requires .NET Framework 4.5.2. This is not updated for the new Sunset Harbor transport lines.
Translation: 該模組使用可執行檔來繪製地圖。這個可執行檔只能在 Windows 上運行，因為需要. ET Framework 4.5.2運行庫。沒有針對 Sunset Harbor 的交通運輸線進行更新。

Source String: The mod works on Windows, Mac OS and Linux. The included standalone 'Load Order Tool' is Windows only and requires an additional .Net install. See Workshop page for details.
Translation: 這個模組能在 Windows 、 Mac OS 和 Linux 上運行。其包含的獨立的 'Load Order Tool' 只能在 Windows 上運行，並且需要安裝額外的 .Net 程式。詳情請查看創意工坊頁面。

Source String: The number of CitizenUnits will be increased correctly, but Watch It incorrectly shows the old number.
Translation: 公民單位的數量將會正確增加，但 Watch It 錯誤地顯示了舊的數量。

Source String: The original mod has been updated with a Chinese translation.
Translation: 原版模組已經更新了中文翻譯。

Source String: The original mod supports the Chinese language.
Translation: 原版模組支援中文語言。

Source String: The replaced signals have no light or animation.
Translation: 更換的信號燈沒有光亮效果或動畫效果。

Source String: The service selections on the Healthcare service selection panel are displayed too low making it difficult or impossible to click.
Translation: 「醫療保健」服務選擇面板上的服務選擇顯示得太低，因此難以或無法點擊。

Source String: The Tab key this mod uses conflicts with several other mods. Either use another first person mod, or change the key in the xml file (see Workshop comments).
Translation: 這個模組使用的 Tab 快速鍵與其他幾個模組衝突。要麼使用其他的第一人稱模組，要麼更改 Xml 文件中的快速鍵(見創意工坊頁面裡的評論)。

Source String: The textures from Theme Decals will probably not match the mixed theme.
Translation: Theme Decals 的紋理可能與混合後的主題不匹配。

Source String: The toolbar won't display correctly with Ploppable RICO.
Translation: 工具列不會正確的顯示 Ploppable RICO。

Source String: The vehicle limit will be increased correctly, but Watch It incorrectly shows the old vehicle limit.
Translation: 車輛限制將會正確提高，但 Watch It 錯誤地顯示了舊的數量。

Source String: The vehicle props generated by Tree & Vehicle Props Patch will have unwanted light effects when the game time is in the night cycle.
Translation: 當遊戲時間在夜間迴圈時，由 Tree & Vehicle Props 生成的車輛擺件會產生不必要的燈光效果。

Source String: The vehicle props generated by Tree & Vehicle Props will have unwanted light effects when the game time is in the night cycle.
Translation: 當遊戲時間在夜間迴圈時，由 Tree & Vehicle Props 生成的車輛擺件會產生不必要的燈光效果。

Source String: The vertical scrollbar in the Toolbar won't work well with Find It. Use another toolbar mod.
Translation: 工具列中的垂直捲動條與 Find It 不相容。使用另一個工具列模組。

Source String: The yellow arrow signals do not operate with TM:PE.
Translation: 黃色箭頭信號不適用於 TM:PE。

Source String: There is no need to upgrade pipes if you don't need pipes at all.
Translation: 如果你根本不需要管道，就不需要升級管道。

Source String: These mods combined can cause blue holes or lines in the ground.
Translation: 這些模一起使用可能會使地面上出現藍洞或者藍線。

Source String: This a map incorrectly labeled as a mod.
Translation: 這張地圖被錯誤地標記為模組。

Source String: This breaks maps saved in the map editor.
Translation: 這會破壞地圖編輯器中的存檔。

Source String: This can be used in a non-commercial way (Creative Commons license), if you name the creator and link to her YouTube or SoundCloud.
Translation: 如果您聯繫過創建者並連結到她的 YouTube 或 SoundCloud，可以非商業方式使用（Creative Commons licensse)。

Source String: This can be used on its own, or be disabled and used as 'prop pack' for the BOB or Traffic Light Replacer mod.
Translation: 這可以單獨使用，或者禁用，並用作 BOB 或 Traffic Light Replacer 的 "擺件替換包"。

Source String: This causes very long loading times if the Loading Time Fix mod is not used.
Translation: 如果不使用 Ploppable Asphalt + [Loading time Fix] 模組，載入時間會變得非常長。

Source String: This combination might cause a performance decrease (FPS drop).
Translation: 與之一起使用可能導致性能下降（幀數下降）。

Source String: This does not include itself in the lists. If you only need a list of mods (and not assets and such), look at the bottom of this report.
Translation: 這不包括在列表中。如果您只需要列出模組(而不是資產和其他)，請查看本報告的底部。

Source String: This does not modify the industrial districts from the Industries DLC. This will significantly increase industrial traffic and may also increase land and noise pollution.
Translation: 這不會改變工業DLC的工業區。這將大大增加工業區交通壓力，也可能增加土地污染和噪音污染。

Source String: This does not work on growable buildings. The author classifies this mod as experimental. Crazy changes may affect gameplay.
Translation: 這不適用於可擺放的建築物。作者將這個模組歸類為實驗性的。隨便更改可能會影響遊戲。

Source String: This doesn't affect tourists.
Translation: 這不會影響遊客。

Source String: This has a 'ghost mode' which allows unsubscribing and still keep the game save accessible.
Translation: 此模組有一個「幽靈模式」。「幽靈模式」下即使取消訂閱此模組，存檔仍然可以載入。

Source String: This is a standard, builtin mod uploaded to the Workshop.
Translation: 這是一個上傳到創意工坊的標準內置模組。

Source String: This is a unofficial fixed version of the Toggleable Whiteness mod.
Translation: 這是一個非官方的 Toggleable Whiteness 修復版模組。

Source String: This is aimed at asset creators, for testing purposes. This works in the game itself, not in the asset editor.
Translation: 這是針對資產作者、用於測試的。它適用於遊戲本身，而不是資產編輯器。

Source String: This is especially meant for users that manually plop RICO buildings (with Ploppable RICO Revisited)
Translation: 這對於手動擺放 RICO 建築物的使用者來說尤其重要(需要具有 Ploppable RICO Revisited)

Source String: This is for testing only and might be removed from the Workshop soon.
Translation: 這只是為了測試，可能很快就會從創意工坊上刪除。

Source String: This is just a template for creating custom namelists.
Translation: 這只是一個用於創建自訂名稱清單的範本。

Source String: This is meant as a one-off fix for cities ruined by sickness. It's recommended to unsubscribe afterwards. This only removes sickness from existing citizens once, a few seconds after game load. It does not prevent new sickness to appear.
Translation: 這是對那些被疾病摧毀的城市的一次性修復。建議使用完畢後退訂。這只會在遊戲載入幾秒鐘後移除現有疾病。它不會阻止新疾病出現。

Source String: This is mostly needed to convert some very old train assets.
Translation: 這主要是為了轉換一些非常舊的火車資產。

Source String: This is no longer needed for any mods, but it might be needed for specific assets.
Translation: 這對於任何模組都不再需要，但對於特定資產可能需要。

Source String: This is no longer needed since game patch 1.13.
Translation: 自遊戲1.13版本以來，這已不再需要。

Source String: This is only a quick 'proof-of-concept' demo, nothing fancy. Simply disables collision checking.
Translation: 這只是一個快速的「概念驗證」演示，沒有什麼特別的。只需禁用碰撞檢查。

Source String: This is only needed for custom networks that require this mod.
Translation: 這僅適用於需要此模組的自訂網路。

Source String: This is only needed for custom station assets that don't have the correct spawn points for full multi track support.
Translation: 這僅適用於自訂車站的資產，因為這些資產沒有正確的生成點來支持多軌道。

Source String: This is only needed for custom tram stations that require this mod.
Translation: 這僅適用於需要此模組的自訂電車站。

Source String: This is only needed for loading saves that used the original New Roads mod. Unsubscribe afterwards. Read the mods description on the Steam Workshop carefully.
Translation: 這僅用於使用原先的 New Roads 模組的存檔。此後請取消訂閱。請仔細閱讀 Steam 創意工坊的模組描述。

Source String: This is only needed for loading saves that used the original Traffic++ mod. Unsubscribe afterwards. Read the mods description on the Steam Workshop carefully.
Translation: 這僅用於使用原先的 Traffic++ 模組的存檔。此後請取消訂閱。請仔細閱讀 Steam 創意工坊的模組描述。

Source String: This is only needed if a prop or mod requires it. Newer props should no longer need this.
Translation: 只有當擺件或模組需要它時，才需要這個。一些新的擺件應該不再需要它。

Source String: This is only needed if an old flag prop or vehicle sub mesh still requires it.
Translation: 只有當一個舊的旗幟擺件或車輛子模型需要它時，才需要使用它。

Source String: This is only needed if an old prop still requires it.
Translation: 只有當舊擺件仍然需要時，才需要它。

Source String: This is only needed if you use the single two-way train track.
Translation: 只有當你使用單條雙向列車軌道時才需要此功能。

Source String: This is only needed to convert the settings from Plop the Growables from an existing game save to Advanced Building Level Control. When it has run, you can unsubscribe it.
Translation: 這只需要將現有存檔中的 Plop the Growable 設置轉換為 Advanced Building Level Control。成功運行後，就可以取消訂閱了。

Source String: This is only needed to recover a corrupt game save. Don't use it on regular play. This will not fix issues related to mods that add networks (Network Extensions, Elevated Train Station Track, etc.).
Translation: 這只是為了恢復損壞的存檔所需要的。不要在正常遊戲中使用。這不會修復能添加道路的模組的相關問題（ Network Extensions ， Elevated Train Station Track 等)。

Source String: This is succeeded by the following prop pack combined with the BOB mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2632539686
Translation: 以下的擺件資產包需要與 BOB 模組一起使用：https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2632539686

Source String: This may be streamed as long as no profit is gained (CC-BY-NC 4.0 license for most tracks).
Translation: 只要沒有獲利，就可以簡化這個程式（大多數軌道使用的 CC-BY-NC 4.0 許可證)。

Source String: This might be incompatible with a variety of mods with similar functionality, but the author is not providing any information on this.
Translation: 這可能與具有類似功能的模組不相容，但作者沒有提供這方面的任何資料。

Source String: This might cause blue voids on Replacer/MOM junctions. There might be other incompatibilities.
Translation: 這可能會在 Replacer/MOM 交叉口形成藍洞。可能還有其他不相容。

Source String: This might cause some lag when opening the panel
Translation: 這可能會導致打開面板時出現一些延遲。

Source String: This might force your GPU the run at full speed, which could cause cooling issues, especially on laptops. Use the included FPS Limiter.
Translation: 這會強制您的 GPU 以全速運行，可能會導致散熱出現問題，尤其是筆記型電腦。可以使用其中的限制幀數功能。

Source String: This might give "Not Enough Buyers" problems when using the lane connection tool from TM:PE.
Translation: 當使用 TM:PE 的車道連接工具時，可能會造成「買家不足」問題。

Source String: This might give an error. See the 24 Aug. 2021 comment on the FPS Booster workshop page for a solution.
Translation: 這可能會造成一個錯誤。請參考 FPS Booster 創意工坊頁面2021年8月24日的評論以獲取解決方案。

Source String: This might not work if you have several separate power grids.
Translation: 如果有多個單獨的電網，這可能不起作用。

Source String: This might only work with all ULOD settings to 'game default'.
Translation: 這可能只適用於當所有 ULOD 參數設置為「遊戲預設」時。

Source String: This use outdated information. The official release of Compatibility Report have multi language support!
Translation: 這使用過時的資訊。官方發佈的 Compatibility Report 已支援多語言！

Source String: This mod combination prevents using the light background theme.
Translation: 此模組組合可防止使用淺色背景主題。

Source String: This mod is not updated for Sunset Harbor and doesn't include the 'Aviation Club Runway'. Use Find It instead.
Translation: 這個模組沒有更新到遊戲的 Sunset Harbor 版本，也不包括「航空俱樂部跑道」。請用 Find It 代替。

Source String: This mod is now only needed for cemeteries. The Waste Transfer and Processing facilities from the game cover the other functionalities from this mod.
Translation: 這個模組現在只是墓地所需要的。遊戲中的垃圾轉移和處理設施包含了這個模組的其他功能。

Source String: This mod is only needed for the Winter Buildings Unlocker mod. All other functionality was integrated into the game itself.
Translation: 這個模組僅適用於 Winter Buildings Unlocker 模組。所有其他功能都被整合到遊戲本身。

Source String: This mod is only needed if you use props that explicitly require it. Newer props that use an AnimUV shader probably don't need the mod.
Translation: 只有當你使用了明確需要它的擺件資產時，才需要這個模組。使用 AnimUV 著色器的新擺件資產可能不需要這個模組。

Source String: Transfer Manager CE deactivates on purpose its internal firefighter AI and uses the one from Smarter Firefighters: Improved AI instead.
Translation: Transfer Manager CE 禁用了其內部的消防AI，並使用 Smarter Firefighters: Improved AI 代替。

Source String: This mod needs at least one traffic light prop pack to function. This mod automatically disables individual traffic light mods on game startup to avoid conflicts, but uses the bundled props from those mods. Leave those other traffic light mods disabled.
Translation: 這個模組至少需要一個紅綠燈擺件資產包才能運行。這個模組會在遊戲啟動時自動禁用單個紅綠燈模組以避免衝突，但會使用這些模組自帶的擺件。讓其他紅綠燈模組保持禁用狀態。

Source String: This mod was only for scenario developers looking for more options.
Translation: 此模組僅適用於尋找更多選項的場景開發者。

Source String: This only erases the current debt when loading a game save, not during gameplay.
Translation: 這只會在載入存檔時去除當前債務，而不是在遊戲期間去除。

Source String: This only works for trucks in cargo train station or cargo harbors. For other spawn points, use Building Spawn Points: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2511258910
Translation: 這只適用於貨運火車站或貨運碼頭的卡車。對於其他的生成點，請使用 Building Spawn Points: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2511258910

Source String: This only works in the map editor.
Translation: 這只適用于地圖編輯器。

Source String: This requires adjusted settings for use with Real Time.
Translation: 這需要調整設置才能與 Real Time 一起使用。

Source String: This seems to be related to the infamous ali213_mod_01 mod.
Translation: 這似乎與臭名昭著的ali213_mod_01模組有關。

Source String: This supports train and metro, but not monorail.
Translation: 這支持火車和地鐵，但不支持單軌列車。

Source String: This supports undoing building/bulldozing roads, buildings, props and trees.
Translation: 這支持撤銷已經建設/已經拆除的道路、建築、擺件和樹木。

Source String: This used to be the newer version, but was deprecated after the original version was updated. Use the original version instead.
Translation: 這曾經是較新的版本，但在原始版本更新後被棄用。請改用原始版本。

Source String: This version is mandatory for beta testers that use the Adaptive Networks ALPHA mod, but also works with the stable version of Adaptive Networks. Vanilla lights on pedestrian roads can't be exchanged.
Translation: Adaptive Networks ALPHA 的測試人員必須使用 Network Skins 的這個版本，但是這個版本也可以與穩定版本的 Adaptive Network 一起使用。此模組無法替換原版人行道上的燈。

Source String: This version may contain bugs, including game save-breaking bugs.
Translation: 此版本可能包含bug，包括破壞存檔的bug。

Source String: This was formerly known as Adaptive Roads (AR).
Translation: 這以前稱為 Adaptive Roads（AR）。

Source String: This was needed for MacOS, because FPS Booster didn't work on MacOS. That should be solved and everyone should be able to use FPS Booster.
Translation: 這對於MacOS來說是必要的，因為 FPS Booster 不會在MacOS上工作。這應該得到解決，每個人都應該能夠使用 FPS Booster 。

Source String: This was only ever needed to fix one specific bridge.
Translation: 這只是修建一座特定橋樑所需要的。

Source String: This was updated for the 1.14 patch, but not fully tested yet. A new update is being worked on.
Translation: 它已更新到1.14版本，但尚未完全測試。一次新的更新正在進行。

Source String: This will not fix buildings that were already abandoned before this mod became active.
Translation: 這不會修復在這個模組啟用之前已經廢棄的建築物。

Source String: This will only unlock 25 tiles at the start of a new game, not on a previous game save.
Translation: 這只會在新遊戲開始時解鎖地塊，而不是在以前的存檔中。

Source String: This works for train tracks only, not for others like tram or metro. This will work for tracks from the basegame and DLCs, and selected Workshop tracks.
Translation: 這適用於火車軌道，不適用於電車軌道或者地鐵。這只適用於基本遊戲和DLC中的軌道，以及創意工坊中指定的軌道。

Source String: Tip: if you have Industries DLC, put a warehouse near power stations to help give them consistent supplies.
Translation: 提示：如果你有工業 DLC，請在電站附近放置一個倉庫，以幫助電站獲得穩定的原料供應。

Source String: TLM already has a 'spawning delay' functionality.
Translation: TLM 已經具有「延遲發車」功能。

Source String: TLM already has auto line color functionality.
Translation: TLM 已經具有給線路自動上色的功能。

Source String: TLM might give an incorrect passenger unloading count.
Translation: TLM 可能給出錯誤的乘客上下車資料。

Source String: TM:PE already has the ability to toggle traffic lights, and much more.
Translation: TM:PE 已經能夠開關紅綠燈，還有更多其他功能。

Source String: To replace all functionality of Ultimate Eyecandy by Play It, also use Render It and Theme Mixer 2.
Translation: 若要使用 Play It 替換 Ultimate Eyecandy 的所有功能，還需要使用 Render It 和 Theme Mixer 2。

Source String: To see the ship/ferry paths while placing a bridge, enable the transport info view.
Translation: 要在鋪設橋樑時查看船隻/輪渡路徑，請啟用交通運輸資訊視圖。

Source String: Toggleable Whiteness includes the functionality of Persistent Resource View. Unsubscribe the latter.
Translation: Toggleable Whiteness 已經具有了 Persistent Resource View 的功能。請取消訂閱後者。

Source String: Trains disallowed to spawn in AVO cannot be selected in TLM.
Translation: 禁止在 AVO 中生成的火車不能在 TLM 中選擇。

Source String: Tree Anarchy already has 'no slope limit' functionality.
Translation: Tree Anarchy 已經具有了「無坡度限制」功能。

Source String: Tree Anarchy already has the functionality of Lock Forestry.
Translation: Tree Anarchy 已經具有了 Lock Forestry 的功能。

Source String: Tree Anarchy already has the functionality of Random Tree Rotation.
Translation: Tree Anarchy 已經具有了 Random Tree Rotation 的功能。

Source String: Tree Anarchy already has the functionality of Tree LOD Fix.
Translation: Tree Anarchy 已經具有了 Tree LOD Fix 的功能。

Source String: Tree Anarchy already has the functionality of Tree Movement Control.
Translation: Tree Anarchy 已經具有了 Tree Movement Control 的功能。

Source String: Tree Anarchy already has the functionality of Tree Snapping.
Translation: Tree Anarchy 已經具有了 Tree Snapping 的功能。

Source String: Tree Anarchy already has the functionality of Unlimited Trees.
Translation: Tree Anarchy 已經具有了 Unlimited Trees 的功能。

Source String: Tree Anarchy has the functionality of Plant Scaling, and much more.
Translation: Tree Anarchy 已經具有了 Plant Scaling 的功能，還有更多其它功能。

Source String: UK Street Names takes priority for street names, but Custom Namelists can still be used for district names.
Translation: UK Street Names 優先於街道名稱，但 Custom Namelists 仍可用於地區名稱。

Source String: Catenaries and Props become black for the supported Vanilla tracks!
Translation: 原版軌道的接觸網和道具變成黑色。

Source String: Undoing props is disabled when using EML.
Translation: 在使用 EML 時禁用撤銷擺件。

Source String: Unsubscribe Holy Water's TM:PE.
Translation: 取消訂閱 Holy Water 的 TM:PE 。

Source String: Unsubscribe Network Extensions 3.
Translation: 取消訂閱 Network Extensions 3 。

Source String: Unsubscribe Shadow Distance Fix, as ACME already include this function.
Translation: 取消訂閱 Shadow Distance Fix ，因為 ACME 已經包含了此功能。

Source String: Upgrade Untouchable breaks the MOM pillar selection.
Translation: Upgrade Untouchable 損壞了 MOM 橋墩的選擇。

Source String: Use 'Enlighten Your Mouse' instead of 'Enhanced Mouse Light'.
Translation: 使用 'Enlighten Your Mouse' 代替 'Enhanced Mouse Light'。

Source String: Use 'Realistic Population Revisited' instead of 'Enhanced Building Capacity'.
Translation: 使用「Realistic Population Revisited」代替「Enhanced Building Capacity」。

Source String: Use BOB instead of Prop It Up.
Translation: 使用 BOB 代替 Prop It Up.

Source String: Use BOB instead of Prop Remover.
Translation: 使用 BOB 代替 Prop Remover。

Source String: Use BOB instead of Prop Switcher.
Translation: 使用 BOB 代替 Prop Switcher.

Source String: Use Ploppable RICO Revisited instead.
Translation: 使用 Ploppable RICO Revisit 代替。

Source String: Transfer Manager CE deactivates on purpose its internal outside connection capacity settings and uses the ones from AdvancedOutsideConnection instead.
Translation: Transfer Manager CE 停用了其對外連接的容量設置，而使用 AdvancedOutsideConnection 代替。

Source String: Use Prop Anarchy combined with Tree Anarchy instead of Prop & Tree Anarchy.
Translation: 使用 Prop Anarchy 和 Tree Anarchy 代替 Prop & Tree Anarchy。

Source String: Use Prop Anarchy instead of Additive Shader.
Translation: 使用 Prop Anarchy 代替 Additive Shader。

Source String: Use Prop Anarchy instead of Decal Prop Fix.
Translation: 使用 Prop Anarchy 代替 Decal Prop Fix。

Source String: Use Prop Anarchy instead of Prop Line Tool.
Translation: 使用 Prop Anarchy 代替 Prop Line Tool。

Source String: Use Prop Anarchy instead of Prop Painter.
Translation: 使用 Prop Anarchy 代替 Prop Painter。

Source String: Use Prop Anarchy instead of Prop Precision.
Translation: 使用 Prop Anarchy 代替 Prop Precision。

Source String: Use Prop Anarchy instead of Prop Scaling.
Translation: 使用 Prop Anarchy 代替 Prop Scaling。

Source String: Use Prop Anarchy instead of Prop Snapping.
Translation: 使用 Prop Anarchy 代替 Prop Snapping。

Source String: Use Prop Anarchy instead of Transparency LODs Fix.
Translation: 使用 Prop Anarchy 代替 Transparency LODs Fix。

Source String: Use the 'Try to recover from Simulation Errors' option from Loading Screen Mod instead, which is more powerful than this mod.
Translation: 使用 Loading Screen Mod 的「嘗試從錯誤中恢復」選項，這比這個模組更強大。

Source String: Use the Loading Screen Mod with the options 'Share textures' and 'Share materials' to reduce memory usage.
Translation: 使用 Loading Screen Mod 的「共用貼圖」和「共用材質」來減少記憶體使用。

Source String: Use the original instead of the now deprecated 2.0 version.
Translation: 使用原來的版本代替現在已廢棄的2.0版本。

Source String: Use the original Precision Engineering mod instead of the now deprecated 2.0 version.
Translation: 使用原來的 Precision Engineering 模組代替現在已廢棄的2.0版本。

Source String: Use the regular version of Harmony instead.
Translation: 使用正常版本的 Harmony 代替。

Source String: Use Tree Anarchy instead of Unlimited Trees.
Translation: 使用 Tree Anarchy 代替 Unlimited Trees。

Source String: Users are reporting an issue with messed up passenger waiting numbers in TLM line view.
Translation: 有使用者在 TLM 線路視圖中報告了一個乘客等候號碼混亂的問題。

Source String: Users are reporting issue with connecting lanes with TM:PE.
Translation: 有使用者報告了 TM:PE 的車道連接問題。

Source String: Users report not being able to freely place parks (Parkify functionality).
Translation: 有使用者報告了無法自由放置公園的問題(Parkify 模組的功能)。

Source String: WARNING: Be very careful when bulldozing train or ship outside connections. This might give errors, but if you save under a new filename and exit to desktop, it might load fine next time. WARNING: Adding, removing or editing aircraft paths often causes issues, preventing all airplanes from spawning.
Translation: 警告：刪除對外連接的航線時要非常小心。這可能會出現錯誤，但如果您使用新名稱存檔並退出到桌面，它下次就會成功載入。警告：添加、刪除或編輯飛機航線往往會造成問題，使所有飛機無法生成。

Source String: WARNING: Potentially harmful mods will also be auto-enabled. WARNING: When you subscribe a mod while the game is running (which is NOT recommended anyway), the mod enables right away, with all kinds of potential issues.
Translation: 警告：潛在的有害模組也將自動啟用。警告：當遊戲正在運行時你訂閱模組(這不推薦)， 這個模組能夠立即使用，這會導致各種潛在的問題。

Source String: Warnings don't (always) update when resolved and might duplicate on new issues.
Translation: 警告在解決後不會（總是）更新，並且可能重複發送新問題。

Source String: When a change is made to a road with one of these mods, the other mod and/or the new default Tree Changer game functionality won't work on that road until the road is reset.
Translation: 當使用其中一個模組對道路進行更改時，其他模組或遊戲自帶的樹木替換功能將無法在該道路上使用，直到道路被重置。

Source String: When changing zoning to a road, changes from Network Skins are reset.
Translation: 當將分區更改為道路時， Network Skins 的更改將被重置。

Source String: When creating assets with the props from this mod, those assets need this version of the mod and can't be used with the original mod.
Translation: 當使用此模組的擺件創建資產時，這些資產需要這個版本的模組，無法與原版模組一起使用。

Source String: When doing automatic replacement, TM:PE settings will be lost on replaced and connected network segments, and lane arrows and lane connectors might be messed up on the entire map.
Translation: 當進行自動替換時，替換和連接處的道路部分將丟失 TM:PE 的設置，地圖上的道路箭頭和車道連接可能會變得混亂。

Source String: When streaming you have to credit the creator, Green~T.
Translation: 當直播時使用該音樂，您必須將此音樂作者標注為 Green~T 。

Source String: When streaming, the current song title should be displayed.
Translation: 當直播時使用該音樂，應顯示當前歌曲標題。

Source String: When switching to Extended InfoPanel 2, you might encounter errors on existing saves.
Translation: 當切換到 Extended InfoPanel 2 時，您可能會在現有存檔中遇到錯誤。

Source String: When unlocking all 81 tiles you don't need No Border Limit Camera.
Translation: 當解鎖所有81個地塊時，你不再需要 No Border Limit Camera。

Source String: When using Move It, dragging with Ctrl also hides the selector.
Translation: 使用 Move It 時，按住 Ctrl 鍵拖動可以隱藏選擇器。

Source String: When using opposite traffic light, timed traffic light configurations where each side of the intersection has different phase timings will not look right.
Translation: 當使用對向的紅綠燈時，路口兩側顯示不同數位的定時紅綠燈會看起來不太合適。

Source String: When using this mod, it is wise to back up your saves from time to time.
Translation: 當使用這個模組時，時常備份你的存檔是明智的。

Source String: When your city reaches about 15000 citizens, this mod will no longer increase the speed above the x4 game default setting.
Translation: 當你的城市達到大約15000個公民時，這個模組將不會再提供超過遊戲預設設置4倍的速度。

Source String: While this mod increases sharpness, it may also introduce noise, moiré patterns and aliasing problems. Especially on higher resolutions, you might not see the difference between this mod active or not.
Translation: 雖然這個模組會增加清晰度，但它也可能帶來噪點、摩爾紋和圖像混疊問題。尤其是在高解析度上，您你可能甚至看不到這個模組啟用與否的區別。

Source String: Will not be able to dump roads that are created with Adaptive Networks Mod
Translation: 無法傾斜使用 Adaptive Networks 模組創建的道路。

Source String: With 81 tiles you don't need Cross The Line.
Translation: 你已經開啟了81格，不需要 Cross The Line。

Source String: With both mods active, placed buildings despawn. Plop the Growables already has the functionality.
Translation: 當兩個模組都啟用時，放置的建築會被摧毀。Plop the Growables 已經具有這個功能。

Source String: Worker usage is the number of workers assigned to the building, not the number of workers in the current shift from Real Time.
Translation: 工人使用率是指分配給建築的工人數量，而不是 Real Time 顯示的當前班次的工人數量。

Source String: You can easily modify the RICO settings in-game.
Translation: 您可以輕鬆修改遊戲中的 RICO 設置。

Source String: You can find newer versions of this LABS version on GitHub: https://github.com/kianzarrin/AdaptiveRoads/releases
Translation: 您可以在 GitHub: https://github.com/kianzarrin / AdaptiveRoads/releases 上找到此 LABS 版本的較新版本。

Source String: You can use this while streaming if you give appropriate credit ('CC BY 3.0' license).
Translation: 如果您根據許可證（'CC BY 3.0' 授權合約）注明作者，那麼您可以在直播時使用此音樂。

Source String: You can't export props with modtools while EML is active.
Translation: 當 EML 啟用時，您不能使用 modtools 匯出擺件。

Source String: You could switch to Tree Anarchy, which has the functionality of both these mods.
Translation: 你可以替換為 Tree Anarchy ，其具有這兩個模組的功能。

Source String: You may receive a 'duplicate pillar' or 'duplicate asset' message when loading a city. This is harmless.
Translation: 載入存檔時，您可能會收到「重複的橋墩」或「重複的資產」資訊，這些是無害的。

Source String: You need to choose your rocket during its construction.
Translation: 你需要在建造過程中選擇你的火箭。

Source String: You only need this mod for passenger harbours and airports. All other functionality was added to the game.
Translation: 你只需要這個模組來處理遊客碼頭和機場。其他所有的功能都已整合到遊戲中。

Source String: You should NOT disable your Windows Firewall, as suggested in the mod description.
Translation: 您不應該按照模組描述中的建議禁用 Windows 防火牆。

Source String: You will have only about 5 to 10 seconds in which to choose your rocket.
Translation: 你只會有大約 5 到 10 秒的時間來選擇你的火箭。

Source String: Zoning Adjuster does what Zoning toolset can do, and much more.
Translation: Zoning Adjuster 已經具有了 Zoning 工具集的功能，還有更多其他的功能。

Source String: Broken with Plazas & Promenades free Game Update 1.15.0-f5.
Translation: 與 Plazas & Promenades 1.15.0-f5 遊戲版本不相容。

Source String: Incompatible with nearly all other mods!
Translation: 與幾乎所有模組不相容！

Source String: Broken with Airports free Game Update 1.14 patch.
Translation: 與遊戲版本1.14的更新不相容。

Source String: Only works on displays with a 16:9 aspect ratio.
Translation: 只適用于寬高比為16:9的顯示器。

Source String: This is the infamous ali213 mod that used to spread like a virus in the Steam Workshop. Don't use it.
Translation: 這是臭名昭著的 ali213 模組，曾經像病毒一樣在Steam 創意工坊中傳播。不要使用它。

Source String: Spawnpoints moved too far from the original spawnpoint sometimes prevent all public transport passengers.
Translation: 生成點離原生成點太遠，有時會阻礙所有公共交通乘客。

Source String: Some UI elements from other mods have a fixed position and cant be moved or scaled correctly, making them appear in odd places.
Translation: 其他模組的一些UI元素有一個固定的位置，無法正確移動或縮放，使它們出現在奇怪的位置。

Source String: Can cause performance issues (lag or fps drops).
Translation: 可能導致性能問題（延遲或 fps 下降)。

Source String: Broken Nodes Detector can't handle EML / Prop Anarchy Props. This means it is unable to "Find Broken Props" and if you try to use this function, an error message pops up. Afterwards a game restart is needed to use other Broken Nodes Detector Functions again.
Translation: 當你使用 EML / Prop Anarchy 模組時，Broken Nodes Detector 無法處理擺件。這意味著，此時它的"Find Broken Props"功能無法使用，如果你嘗試使用這個功能，會彈出一條錯誤資訊，並且在此之後你需要重新開機遊戲，才能使用 Broken Nodes Detector 的其他功能。

Source String: You must follow exactly the steps on the workshop page to use it.
Translation: 您必須跟隨創意工坊頁面上的步驟才能使用。

Source String:
DON'T USE THE GENERATED PROPS in mods like BOB, Pocedural Objects or Intersection Marking Tool. This can break your save!

It's somehow logical and not an issue of these mods. Non Terrain Conforming Props as well as Tree & Vehicle Props are generated at a specific point in the loading process (they are not stored!) This means using these assets in mods, will lead to the issue that they cant be loaded, simply because they are not created at the moment the networks and other things are loaded.
Translation:
請勿在其他模組（如 BOB、Procedural Objects 或 Intersection Marking Tool）中使用此模組生成的擺件。這麼做可能損壞你的存檔！

在某種程度上，這是合乎邏輯的，並且這不是這些模組的問題。在載入存檔的過程中，Non Terrain Conforming Props 和 Tree & Vehicle Props 會在指定的位置生成擺件（這些擺件並沒有被保存在存檔中！）這意味著在其他模組中使用這些資產，會出現無法載入擺件的錯誤，因為它們不是在載入 networks 和其他內容時生成的。

Source String: There is not much information about this mod, but there are reports that this conflicts with other mods. Use Service Vehicle Selector 2 instead.
Translation: 沒有多少關於這個模組的資訊，但有報告說這與其他模組衝突。使用 Service Vehicle Selector 2 代替。

Source String: It takes some in-game time for the extra money to arrive.
Translation: 額外資金的到賬需要一些遊戲時間。

Source String: Compatible with Advanced Building Level Control only when level Randomization is OFF.
Translation: 僅當建築級別隨機化關閉時，才與 Advanced Building Level Control 相容。

Source String: Not work with actual game versions as the dependency mod Roads United Core 2.0 is not updated any more.
Translation: 無法相容現在的遊戲版本，因為依賴型模組 Roads United Core 2.0 不再更新。

Source String: Includes malicious code!
Translation: 包含惡意程式碼！

Source String: Incompatible with any kind of automated bulldoze mods.
Translation: 與任何自動推土機模組不相容。

Source String: Causes game crashes.
Translation: 導致遊戲崩潰。

Source String: Game might get corrupted.
Translation: 遊戲可能已損壞。

Source String: Conflicts with various other mods.
Translation: 與其他各種模組衝突。

Source String: For several players it causes errors and is not working.
Translation: 對一些玩家來說，它會導致錯誤，且無法工作。

Source String: Incompatible with Dynamic Resolution and other Camera Mods.
Translation: 與 Dynamic Resolution 和其他攝像機模組不相容。

Source String: This doesn't work for the new metro stations from the 'Content Creator Pack: Train Stations', and for some custom stations. You could use Move It instead for those stations.
Translation: 這不適用於「內容創建者包：火車站」中的新地鐵站和一些自訂車站。您可以使用 Move It 代替那些車站。

Source String: Disasters are not recognized.
Translation: 災害未被識別。

Source String: This might work, but it's not the best way to solve the issue. The game already solves this itself by employing some highly educated people in lower-education jobs, or you could use Employ Overeducated Workers V2 instead for a stronger effect.
Translation: 這也許是可用的，但這不是解決問題的最佳辦法。遊戲已經通過雇用一些受過高等教育的人從事低教育的工作來解決這個問題。或者你可以使用 Empras Ovevered Workers V2 來提高效果。

Source String: Results are not reliable anymore. Use Compatibility Report instead.
Translation: 結果已不再可靠。請使用 Compatibility Report 代替。

Source String: This might not function with a 3DxWare driver version higher than 10.6.4.
Translation: 3DxWare 驅動程式版本高於10.6.4時可能無法起作用。

Source String: The button cannot be moved, making the stats go off-screen on certain screen resolutions.
Translation: 該按鈕不能被移動，這使得在某些螢幕解析度上，統計資料處於螢幕之外。

Source String: Several users report it is not working at all.
Translation: 好幾個使用者報告說它根本沒有工作。

Source String: Do not unlock all roads.
Translation: 無法解鎖所有道路。

Source String: It can cause visual glitches in menu (tabs without description and/or image).
Translation: 它會在功能表中造成錯誤視圖(無描述/圖像的選項)。

Source String: Some users report the UI as missing when not subscribed to Fine Road Tools.
Translation: 有些使用者在未訂閱 Fine Road Tools 時報告 UI 缺失。

Source String: Deleting a road segment with adjusted pathfinding might cause a NullReference error.
Translation: 刪除路徑調整後的路段可能導致 NullReference 錯誤。

Source String: Several users report error messages, not working at all or side effects like noise pollution not reduced anymore.
Translation: 好幾個使用者報告了它的問題：完全不起作用或負作用。例如噪音污染不再減少。

Source String: For some users citizens don't take a car, but despawn and respawn at their home, sometimes walking to the same station/stop again.
Translation: 對於一些使用者來說，市民不坐車，而是在家中自己生成或者消失，有時會重複走到同一個車站/網站。

Source String: The Paradox Launcher has this functionality.
Translation: Paradox 啟動器具有此功能。

Source String: The brush sometimes stops working. Unsubscribing and resubscribing (while the game is not running) often helps for a while, but a more permanent solution is to use the Loading Order Mod and set the loading order of Forest Brush to 9999.
Translation: 刷子有時會停止工作。取消訂閱和重新訂閱（當遊戲不運行時）通常能解決短期問題，但一個更永久的解決方案是使用 Loading Order Mod 並將 Forest Brush 的載入順序設置為9999。

Source String: Not compatible with Unlock All + Wonders & Landmarks.
Translation: 與 Unlock All + Wonders & Landmarks 不相容。

Source String: External ressources are not used therefor you can’t use it on a new map. Various players report it’s not working at all.
Translation: 外部資源沒有使用，因此您不能在新地圖上使用它。多位玩家報告它根本沒有工作。

Source String: Correct name for the mod would be "Less Garbage Cost", as it only reduces the cost!
Translation: 模組的正確名稱應該是 「減少垃圾處理設施維護成本」 ，因為模組只會減少垃圾處理設施維護成本，而不會減少垃圾的產生！

Source String: User reports that it is not working at all if you select heavy traffic.
Translation: 有使用者報告說，如果您選擇高交通流量，那麼它根本無法工作。

Source String: Some users report volume too low or no sound at all for some tracks.
Translation: 有些使用者報告說音量過低或根本沒有聲音。

Source String: Only a limited set of roads is included.
Translation: 只包括一套有限的道路資產。

Source String: This was or is missing a needed file. The mod was updated, but no indication that this was solved.
Translation: 它缺少一個前置檔。該模組已更新，但沒有跡象表明這個問題已經解決。

Source String: Highway textures will mirror randomly per segment when applying this mod and need to be rebuilt to fix.
Translation: 當應用此模組時，高速路的每個路段的紋理都會隨機鏡像排列，需要重建才能修復。

Source String: The building info panel that pops up from the toolbar when placing buildings gives the old values for trucks/employees/etc.
Translation: 放置建築物時，工具列上彈出的資訊面板顯示的卡車/工人等資訊為舊數值。

Source String: This is incompatible with mods that also change building capacity. Use Realistic Population Revisited instead for better compatibility.
Translation: 這與同樣改變建築物容量的模組不相容。請使用 Realistic Population Revisited 代替它以便更好地相容。

Source String: Vanilla passenger trains no longer spawn in color variation.
Translation: 原版客運列車不再出現顏色變化。

Source String: Cause issues in late game. Better option is to use Game Anarchy and maximize the land value and entertainment.
Translation: 在遊戲後期會引發問題。更好的選擇是使用 Game Anarchy ，並開啟最大化地價與最大化娛樂。

Source String: Breaks the pause after loading game option.
Translation: 載入遊戲後的自動暫停功能失效。

Source String: As it is an outdated mod some panels may noth be unlocked.
Translation: 由於這是一個過時的模組，一些面板可能無法解鎖。

Source String: This sometimes breaks transport lines.
Translation: 這有時會破壞運輸線路。

Source String: DLCs after Campus can’t be selected.
Translation: 無法選擇校園DLC之後的DLC。

Source String: Parks might not level up if other than original pathes are used within the park area.
Translation: Parks might not level up if other than original pathes are used within the park area.

Source String: Missing settings for the last few DLCs: Parklife, Industries, Campus, and Sunset Harbor.
Translation: 最後幾個DLC的設置丟失：Parklife、 Industries、 Campus 和 Sunset Harbor

Source String: Works only with maps subscribed from the workshop. Uses detour and therefor incompatible with various other – mainly Harmony – mods.
Translation: 只適用於從創意工坊上訂閱的地圖。並與其他基於 Harmony 的模組不相容。

Source String: 'Make historical' is part of the game itself now, but with this mod a historical building can't get abandoned.
Translation: 「設置歷史建築」是遊戲本身的功能，但使用這個模組可以讓歷史建築不廢棄。

Source String: Depending on screen resolution it might be needed to use UI Resolution 1.2 (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487213155) to see all of TLM's UI
Translation: 視螢幕解析度而定，您可能需要使用 UI Resolution 1.2（https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487213155）來查看 TLM 所有的 UI

Source String: Button for the settings not visible for several users.
Translation: 「設置」按鈕對多個使用者不可見。

Source String: The traffic lights on some custom road do not change.
Translation: 某些自訂道路上的紅綠燈沒有變化。

Source String: Not able to name new districts.
Translation: 無法命名新的地區。

Source String: Not working on Vanilla roads from later than Sunser Harbour. You could keep subscribed but deactivated to use BOB https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2197863850 to exchange the props.
Translation: 不適用於 Sunser Harbour DLC 之後更新的原版路。儘管如此，該模組仍可以訂閱，並對禁用 BOB https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2197863850 以替換擺件。

Source String: Resources deplete instead of being unlimited, language switches back to English every start and game is unlocked even if this function is deactivated.
Translation: 資源會耗盡而不是無限。每次啟動時語言會切換回英語，即使禁用此功能，遊戲也會被解鎖。

Source String: Simulation Errors and conflits with various other mods.
Translation: 類比錯誤和與其他模組衝突。

Source String: Doesn't show up in the CSL Music Mod.
Translation: 不在 CSL 音樂模組中顯示。

Source String: This is not updated for the Industries DLC and will probably not work for the industrial areas from that DLC.
Translation: 這尚未針對工業DLC進行更新，並且可能不適用於此DLC中的工業區域。

Source String: On a T-intersection, no light appears on the intersecting road.
Translation: 在T型路口，交叉道路上不會出現燈光。

Source String: Some report not being able to save the game, especially with large numbers of procedural objects.
Translation: 有些報告說無法保存遊戲，特別是存檔內有大量的魔物（Procedural Objects）時。

Source String: This mod increases loading time, and this increase can be huge for big cities.
Translation: 這個模組增加了遊戲載入時間，對於大城市來說，這種增加可能是巨大的。

Source String: The default English names still appear as well, next to the new Japanese names.
Translation: 預設的英文名稱仍然顯示在新的日文名稱旁邊。

Source String: Flickering or disappearing buildings.
Translation: 會導致建築物閃爍或者消失。

Source String: This is an incomplete version to lure you into buying a complete version.
Translation: 這是一個不完整的版本，旨在吸引您購買完整的版本。

Source String: TouristAI error.
Translation: TouristAI 錯誤。

Source String: Forgets settings at start.
Translation: 在進入存檔（開始）時會丟失此模組的設置

Source String: Not working with the buildings from Promenades & Plazas DLC. Causing various glitches and sometimes even crashes!
Translation: 不適用於 Promenades & Plazas DLC 的建築。會導致各種錯誤，有時甚至崩潰！

Source String: Several users report services not spawning vehicles anymore.
Translation: 一些使用者報告說公共服務點不再生成車輛。

Source String: Not working for all buildings, terrain spikes and holes, performance issues, errors messages.
Translation: 不適用於所有建築物，可能會出現地形尖刺和空洞，存在性能問題和錯誤資訊。

Source String: Assets that are part of a mod might no longer be auto-enabled by the game.
Translation: 作為模組一部分的資產，可能不再被遊戲自動啟用。

Source String: Render It! will deactivate its overlapping functions to be compatible with the other mod. Therefore the advice it to use only Render It! instead.
Translation: Render it! 會禁用它與其他模組重複的功能來與其他模組相容，因此建議只使用 Render It! 模組。

Source String: LOD not correct.
Translation: LOD存在錯誤。

Source String: Do not remove trees added after Campus DLC to the game.
Translation: 不要移除在校園DLC之後添加到遊戲中的樹木。

Source String: This causes (vanilla) trees to flicker.
Translation: 這使得(原版）樹閃爍。

Source String: If you subscribe to wrong configured assets that need this mod, these assets can cause game issues.
Translation: 如果您訂閱了需要此模組的錯誤配置的資產，會導致遊戲出現錯誤。

Source String: Not recognise few latest DLC sounds.
Translation: 沒有識別到最新的DLC聲音。

Source String: Not able to filter new DLC content, lags the game.
Translation: 無法識別新的DLC內容，落後於遊戲版本。

Source String: Multiple reports about getting a blank screen when loading a map.
Translation: 多個使用者報告說，載入地圖時螢幕變成空白的。

Source String: The reported issues might be unknown mod conflicts.
Translation: 所報告的問題可能是未知的模組衝突。

Source String: Some users get it to work fine, but there are quite some reports, including about settings resetting between loads.
Translation: 有些玩家可以正常使用，但有相當多的報告，包括重置存檔的設置。

Source String: On game load, the previous value is loaded correctly, but the slider in mod options will always be in the default position.
Translation: 遊戲能夠正確載入上次設定的數值，但模組選項中的滑塊始終處於預設位置。

Source String: White lines at the moon and Flickering when game running.
Translation: 遊戲運行時月球會閃爍並出現白色線條。

Source String: Lag, game freezes and screen flashes are reported. Use with caution, or unsubscribe.
Translation: 已報告出現延遲、遊戲卡頓和螢幕閃爍。請謹慎使用或取消訂閱。

Source String: Not showing up ingame.
Translation: 不顯示 ingame。

Source String: This causes invisible transport lines.
Translation: 這會導致運輸線路不可見。

Source String: "Make it Rain" must be clicked (in Options) if many mods are used. Without mods it works on its own. Rain may flicker for a bit but settles later.
Translation: 如果使用了許多MOD，則必須選擇「下雨」（在選項中）。沒有MOD，它自己也能運行。雨水可能會閃爍一段時間，但稍後會停下來。

Source String: Causes strange effects on junctions and conflicts with various Mods.
Translation: 對交叉路口造成奇怪的影響，並與各種模組發生衝突。

Source String: This might block the vanilla quay upgrade tool.
Translation: 這可能會遮罩原版查詢更新工具。

Source String: Various issues, unstable. Road arrow functionality not working, or only after disabling and re-enabling it on each load. Not all roads are supported.
Translation: 此模組不穩定且有各種問題。道路箭頭功能無法使用，或者僅在每次載入存檔前禁用並重新啟用時才能使用。此模組並非所有道路都能使用。

Source String: This requires a deprecated and broken mod.
Translation: 這需要一個廢棄並已損壞的模組。

Source String: Public transport part not working anymore.
Translation: 公共交通部分不再起作用。

Source String: Not able to highlight new districts.
Translation: 無法突出顯示新的地區。

Source String: This might generate 'No Heat' warning on maps that don't require heat. Apply the policy 'Only use electricity for heating' to fix this.
Translation: 這可能會在不需要供暖的地圖上生成「無暖氣」警告。應用「僅使用電加熱」政策來解決此問題。

Source String: Nursing Homes show as Deathcare coverage when placing them.
